text: Kutama is a town in the Zvimba District of Mashonaland West Province in Zimbabwe. The town is home to the Kutama College and was the birthplace of Zimbabwe's former President Robert Mugabe. Mugabe was buried in the courtyard of his rural homestead in Kutama on 28 September 2019.‘’Zimbabwe's Mugabe buried in home village, ending an era’’ by Gift Sukhala and Philemon Bulawayo of Reuters; published September 28, 2019 == References == Category:Zvimba District Category:Populated places in Mashonaland West Province
title: Kutama, Zimbabwe
